snippet: LEAD: Two groups of gamblers and an individual player will share a $61.9 million lottery jackpot that officials say is the world's largest, it was announced today....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Two groups of gamblers and an individual player will share a $61.9 million lottery jackpot that officials say is the world's largest, it was announced today.

headline.main: 2 Clubs and Lone Player to Share Record Prize
